verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In your presence I'm free of shame
Always there when I call Your name,
Never disappointed in me,
And in Your will I'm completely free

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I place, my trust in You
I place, my trust in You

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are faithful, faithful,
A faithful, faithful father.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are my Child, my precious child
And I'm pleased with you
